s.es: We also went to see the film.
Since you've accepted the invitation, I'll also accept it.
s.cs: 既然你已接受邀请，那我也接受邀请。

des.s: 而是在作完了一些事之偶,"也"坐下来听主讲道. "......她'也'坐下来在耶稣脚前听祂的话. "按原文,本节有一个"也"(also)字,这个"也"字相当重要,表示她不是无所事事,光坐在那里享受;而是在作完了一些事之偶,"也"坐下来听主讲道.
例如,然而,却(but),正如(just as),因为(because),所以(therefore),并且(also)等等. 修辞风格(figures of speech)是圣经文学的特色,直接影响一位读者对该段经文的认识和解释. 圣经中通用的修辞有:这两大动作已足够让读者去解构任何的本文.
再则软件也好没弄好,以前没自己用过GPS,不知诺基亚x3是智能机吗道2~3分钟算不算快,等机友们测试了再讨论但有人提到只支持A-GPS应该是不准确的说明书上把GPS和A-GPS分开讲的,而且提到了"还(also)支持A-GPS"
develop 开发 | also 同样 | also covers 还包括

des.d: abbr. advanced life support for obstetrics; 高级产科生命复苏课程

des.s: 其他类似的还有 "参见" (See also) 跟 "列表" (List), 能不能使用 "延伸阅读"及 "名录" 来代替呢??
改进了帮助内的导航功能,并优化了"另请参阅"(See Also)链接、行内链接和书签的使用. 针对 PTC.com 的"知识库"(Knowledge Base), "教程"(Tutorials)以及"技术支持工具"(Technical Support Tools),添加了相应的链接.
这样,当法院指出行政机构必须使用通告评论程序修正"规制"时,也就是在说行政机构对立法性规则加以修正时,必最后,在瘫痪老兵案中,法院还加了一个"另见"(see also)引注[127],援引的是华盛顿特区巡回法院1992年在全国计划生育和生

convenience 便利性 | so also 因此 | so forth 等

netsen.cs: 这也是本文的重要内容。
netsen.es: This is also an important content of this paper.

netsen.cs: 这也是我工作的一部分。
netsen.es: This is also part of my job.

netsen.cs: 这也是本文的研究目的。
netsen.es: This is also the purpose of this research.
I love you, I would also like to see.

c.cs: 大家都知道，包装直接关系到产品的销售。
c.es: You know, packing has a close bearing on sales.

c.cs: 是的，它也会影响我们产品的信誉，买主总是很注意包装。
c.es: Yes, it also affects the reputation of our products. Buyers always pay great attention to packing.

c.cs: 我们希望新包装会使我们的顾客满意。
c.es: We wish the new packing will give our clients satisfaction.
I'd like to buy some stamps for this letter.
Let me just weigh it first.
How much will it be?
Are you sending it by regular or by speed?
Just the regular.
That'll be four yuan.

c.cs: 我的信件到达目的地要多久？
c.es: How long will it take for my mail to reach its destination?
Just two days.
Thanks.
Good day.
Good day also to you.

c.cs: 我想用第一类邮件寄这个包裹。
c.es: I want to send this package by first class mail.
Do you want it insured?

c.cs: 是的，请按五十元保险。我还想买些邮票---十张两角两分的和三张航空信邮票。
c.es: Yes, for fifty dollars, please. I'd also like some stamps-a book of twenty two and three airmail's.

c.cs: 你要到那边的邮票窗口去买，邮件待领窗口隔壁。
c.es: You'll have to get those at the stamp window over there, next to general delivery.

c.cs: 在那儿我也能要汇款单吗？
c.es: Can I get money orders there, too?

c.cs: 不，那在左面，沿大厅过去三个窗口。
c.es: No, that's to the left, three windows down the hall.

baike.title: Also
baike.abs:
also【/ls/ DJ /lso/ DJ US /'lso/ KK US 】
in addition; too 而且；此外；也；同样 adverb
She's fluent in French and German. She also speaks a little Italian. 她的法语和德语讲得流利，也会说一点意大利语。
rubella, also known as German measles rubella （风疹），亦称 German measles
I didn't like it that much. Also, it was much too expensive. 我并不怎么喜欢它。再说它太贵了。 informal
Jake's father had also been a doctor (= both Jake and his father were doctors). 杰克和他的父亲都是医生。
She was not only extremely intelligent but also very practical. 她不仅绝顶聪明，而且非常务实。
also
You can use also to give more information about a person or thing, or to add another relevant fact.
You can use also to indicate that something you have just said about one person or thing is true of another person or thing.
also-ran
